attributes.action: Make Finsbury Park station and surrounding areas safe.Urgent action required.
attributes.additional_details: People have a lack of confidence in the transport polices influence in the area.- area at night does not feel safe .A big issue seller helped us she said -"never show your fear ,always shout louder"-this is us shouting change needs to happen- None of us should feel unsafe walking the streets.A change needs to happen more signatures more likely
attributes.background: My friend and I were pursued and intimidated at Finsbury Park station  near the entrance to Parkland Walk when exiting the station.Cases of harassment in the area are on the increase and people are made to feel unsafe using the station because of it. It needs addressing and quickly.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Safety around Finsbury Park station is the responsibility of the Metropolitan Police, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
